(This is for 5971 too)
Lunarpine looked at her, she couldn't transform? things just kept 
getting better.(Sarcasm)
"How bad is it?"Lunarpine asked with concern in his eyes. "Can you 
still move yourself or do you need help?"
He wasn't disapointed at her for getting hurt, he was disapointed in 
her for running (Flying) away. He could tell this unit had no 
discipline, or order. 

"Lunarpine to base, I found Shadow Wing, she's injured and we need an 
airlift home."

Lunarpine now realized that this team wasn't a fighting unit but more 
of a unit of friends trying to survive.

"OK Wing lets get walking, we'll meet our transportation half way."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She didn't look up at Lunarpine.  She was to hurt in the spark.  
She 
> dissapointed herself and worse, dissapointed him.  She wished she 
had 
> been scrapped by the pred.  
> She spoke softly, " I can't transform into my beast mode.  I 
damaged 
> a wing. I can't fly for a while. Go one without me. I'll make it 
back 
> to the base."
> 
> She really didn't want him to go. But at the same time, she was 
very 
> ashamed of herself and her actions.  Once again, her emotions got 
her 
> in trouble.  And now she worried that she might loose a friend as a 
> result.
